scripts.get-many: npx sls invoke local -f PetsGetManyApi -p events/get-many.json
scripts.get-one: npx sls invoke local -f PetsGetOneApi -p events/get-one.json
scripts.create-one: npx sls invoke local -f PetsCreateOneApi -p events/create-one.json
scripts.update-one: npx sls invoke local -f PetsUpdateOneApi -p events/update-one.json
